# Hacktoberfest 2022 - JavaScript Medium Programs

## Pokedex

### Description
This program is used to fetch the data of a pokemon from the PokeAPI and display it on the screen. It uses the FetchApi to bring data from the PokeAPI

### Image Example
![Pokedex](data:image/png;base64,)
